name: Broken Modules
description:
You are lost in space with nothing but your half ruined spaceship. Mine and fight your way through space, and try to survive as long as possible.

Controls:
Use your mouse to build modules
Shop button in lower right to open shop
WASD or Arrow Keys to move camera

Usability notes:

If occasionally it appears that something should happen and it didn't, it most likely failed due to the broken modules mechanic (i.e. the roll the dice to see if it works). Failure states don't have the cleares indications, usually just a sound, so it can be confusing.

If you press something in the building menu and nothing happens, you did not have sufficient resources to purchase that thing, did unfortunately not have the time to add an indicator here.
